## Summary

A clear, one-sentence description of the feature.

## Problem It Solves

What user need or pain point does this address?

## Proposed Solution

How should it work? Include any UI/UX ideas if relevant.

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you thought of (and why you prefer the proposed solution).

## Additional Context

Mockups, examples from other apps, or any other context.
